title: Unidentified minerals

properties.name: description
properties.value: Unidentified minerals are rare minerals obtained by mining rocks in the members area of the Mining Guild. They can be traded in for mining gloves, superior mining gloves, soft clay packs, and bags full of gems at Belona's Mining Guild Mineral Exchange. Players can also pay 60 minerals to combine both gloves into a pair of expert mining gloves.

Item ID21341

Unidentified minerals are rare minerals obtained by mining rocks in the members area of the Mining Guild. They can be traded in for mining gloves, superior mining gloves, soft clay packs, and bags full of gems at Belona's Mining Guild Mineral Exchange. Players can also pay 60 minerals to combine both gloves into a pair of expert mining gloves.

When using an infernal pickaxe in the members area of the mining guild the Smithing effect will NOT negate the ability to receive unidentified minerals upon its proc.

At current Grand Exchange prices, the item that is worth the most coins per mineral spent is a soft clay pack, worth 1,770 per unidentified mineral.

Obtaining[edit | edit source]

The chances of obtaining one are dependent on the rock they are obtained from:[1]

Rock Chance
Iron rocks 1/100
Coal rocks 1/60
Mithril rocks 1/40
Adamantite rocks 1/30
Runite rocks 1/20
Amethyst crystals 1/20

Mining enhancers do not provide an additional roll for Unidentified Minerals in the Mining Guild when the effect triggers.[2]

Unidentified minerals obtained while your inventory is full will drop to the floor.

You can also stop receiving unidentified minerals by speaking to Belona and choosing the "I don't want to receive minerals." option and can start receiving them by talking to her again and choosing the "I would like to receive minerals." option.

Exchanging[edit | edit source]

Main article: Mining Guild Mineral Exchange

At current values based on the price of soft clay, each unidentified minerals is worth 1,770 coins.

Likewise, based on the average value of bag full of gems, each unidentified minerals is worth 1,359.3 coins.

Item Cost GE Value
Bag full of gems 20 27,186
Soft clay pack 10 17,700
Mining gloves 60 N/A
Superior mining gloves 120 N/A

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Mod Ed. "Mining Guild Expansion." 22 June 2017. (Archived from the original on 28 March 2022.) Old School Announcements Forums.
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod ash's Twitter account. 19 October 2020. (Archived from the original on 24 August 2021.) Mod ash: "No, you only get one roll for minerals even if the Varrock diary gave you an extra amethyst."

[[File:Unidentified minerals detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Unidentified minerals''' are rare minerals obtained by mining rocks in the members area of the [[Mining Guild]]. They can be traded in for [[mining gloves]], [[superior mining gloves]], [[soft clay pack]]s, and [[bag full of gems|bags full of gems]] at [[Belona]]'s [[Mining Guild Mineral Exchange]]. Players can also pay 60 minerals to combine both gloves into a pair of [[expert mining gloves]].

When using an [[infernal pickaxe]] in the members area of the mining guild the Smithing effect will NOT negate the ability to receive unidentified minerals upon its proc.

At current Grand Exchange prices, the item that is worth the most coins per mineral spent is a {{#ifexpr: {{Average drop value|Bag full of gems|raw=y}} / 20 > {{GEP|Soft clay|10}} |[[bag full of gems]], worth {{NoCoins|{{#expr:{{Average drop value|Bag full of gems|raw=y}} / 20}}}}|[[soft clay pack]], worth {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Soft clay|10}}}}}} per unidentified mineral.

==Obtaining==
The chances of obtaining one are dependent on the rock they are obtained from:{{CiteForum|author=Mod Ed|url=http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?380,381,397,65924240,goto,4|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/tNJJY|archivedate=28 March 2022|title=Mining Guild Expansion|forum=Old School Announcements|postdate=22 June 2017}}

|-

|-
| [[Amethyst crystals]] || 1/20
|}

[[Mining enhancers]] do not provide an additional roll for Unidentified Minerals in the Mining Guild when the effect triggers.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1318248740071874560|date=19 October 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.is/raYWt|archivedate=24 August 2021|quote=No, you only get one roll for minerals even if the Varrock diary gave you an extra amethyst.}}

Unidentified minerals obtained while your inventory is full will drop to the floor. 

You can also stop receiving unidentified minerals by speaking to Belona and choosing the "I don't want to receive minerals." option and can start receiving them by talking to her again and choosing the "I would like to receive minerals." option.

==Exchanging==
{{Main|Mining Guild Mineral Exchange}}
At current values based on the price of [[soft clay]], each unidentified minerals is worth {{Coins|{{GEP|Soft clay|10}}}} coins.

Likewise, based on the average value of [[bag full of gems]], each unidentified minerals is worth {{Coins|({{GEP|Uncut sapphire|19.96}}+{{GEP|Uncut emerald|13.85}}+{{GEP|Uncut ruby|4.73}}+{{GEP|Uncut diamond|1.24}}+{{GEP|Uncut dragonstone|0.22}})/20}} coins.
